import React, { Component } from 'react' import CourseService from '../../Services/courseService' let courseServ export default class CourseItem extends Component { onDeleteCourse = (maKhoaHoc) => { CourseService this.props.deleteCourse(this.props.course.maKhoaHoc) } render() { let { course } = this.props return (
{course.tenKhoaHoc}
